common.title: Ahlan wa Sahlan
common.title1: Welcome to OPAL, the Procurement, ICV and Investment platform operated & endorsed by Industrial Innovation Academy (IIA). OPAL is utilised by Tender Board & Oman Investment Authority (OIA), for their procurement needs and also to monitor the ICV progress.
common.title2: We at IIA are excited to have you onboard the OPAL, the single-window Supplier Chain Certification platform.
common.title3: Please proceed with the Certification payment and apply for the OPAL Supplier Chain Certification at the earliest.
common.title4: We wish you all success on the OPAL Certified Suppliers Chain platform.
